author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-3616. Fix a ConcurrentModificationException bug that BP actor threads may not be shutdown properly in DataNode.  Contributed by Jing Zhao

author: erans
msg: First steps to upgrade the API of the classes in "o.a.c.m.optimization.general".
Please note the introduction of a "Weight" matrix (whereas the current code
assumes that the weights are given as an array).

author: dkulp
msg: Attempt to fix some hard to debug blueprint "grace period" hangs.
If a bundle has multiple processors, only stop and restart the services references once.
